            program combined
            implicit none

            ! Declarations
            character(len=200000) :: S
            character(len=:), allocatable :: s3
            integer :: n, i, j, radix, tmp, digit, mod_arr(1:200000), mod_cnt(0:2018), distinct
            integer(kind=8) :: ans, temp
            integer(kind=4) :: n32, result2
            character(len=20) :: buffer
            integer :: freq(0:255)
            logical :: ok

            ! Step1: Read input string
            read(*, '(a)') S
            S = adjustl(S)
            n = len_trim(S)

            ! Step2: First program
            mod_cnt = 0
            radix = 1
            mod_arr = 0

            do i = 1, n
                ! Extract the i-th character from the end (0-indexed: the last is the first)
                digit = iachar(S(n-i+1:n-i+1)) - iachar('0')
                ! Compute tmp = (digit * radix) mod 2019
                tmp = digit * radix
                tmp = modulo(tmp, 2019)
                if (i > 1) then
                    tmp = modulo(tmp + mod_arr(i-1), 2019)
                end if
                mod_arr(i) = tmp
                mod_cnt(tmp) = mod_cnt(tmp) + 1
                radix = modulo(radix * 10, 2019)
            end do

            mod_cnt(0) = mod_cnt(0) + 1   ! as in the Java program

            ans = 0
            do i = 0, 2018
                if (mod_cnt(i) > 0) then
                    temp = mod_cnt(i)
                    ans = ans + (temp * (temp-1)) / 2
                end if

            ! Step4: Second program

            ! Step5: Convert to string

            s3 = trim(buffer)

            end do
